item.title: ssh-keygen
item.description: Name ssh-keygen - OpenSSH authentication key utility. Synopsis ssh-keygen [-t rsa | ed25519 | ...] [-b bits] [-N new_passphrase] [-f output_keyfile] Examples Interactive ssh-keygen asks for the path to the output file and the passphrase for the private key. ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "user@domain.tld" ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -C "user@domain.tld" Please note: The rsa algorith is the default. ed25519 might not be supported on all systems. For Scripts ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "user@domain.
